query:
SELECT courseId, moduleNumber, title, CHAR_LENGTH(content) as content_length 
FROM training_modules 
WHERE courseId IN (2, 3) 
ORDER BY courseId, moduleNumber;

FROM training_modules 
WHERE courseId IN (2, 3)
